outfits.name: SAINT LAURENT Wallet On Chain
outfits.description: Saint Laurent’s effortlessly chic Monogram chain wallet embodies the essence of Parisian chic and elegance. Crafted in Italy from dark blue matelassé leather, it is detailed with a magnetic closure, an interior zipped compartment, multiple internal card slots, bill and receipt slots and Saint Laurent’s iconic YSL logo to the front.

outfits.name: Satin-Paneled Crepe Mini Dress
outfits.description: This antique-rose version is designed just for us. Made from lightweight crepe, it has ladylike neck ties and is paneled with lustrous satin. Temper its mini hemline with flat sandals.

outfits.name: PARMA Dress
outfits.description: Via Miralles, an emerging designer based in Oslo
